10 RobotFactory::RobotFactory(ros::NodeHandle& nh)
11  : nh_(nh),
12  pf(pfuclt_ptcls::ParticleFilter(N_PARTICLES, NUM_TARGETS, STATES_PER_ROBOT, MAX_ROBOTS))
13 {
14  for (uint rn = 0; rn < MAX_ROBOTS; rn++)
15  {
16  if (PLAYING_ROBOTS[rn])
17  {
18  Eigen::Isometry2d initialRobotPose(
19  Eigen::Rotation2Dd(-M_PI).toRotationMatrix());
20  initialRobotPose.translation() =
21  Eigen::Vector2d(POS_INIT[2 * rn + 0], POS_INIT[2 * rn + 1]);
22 
23  timeInit = ros::Time::now();
24  ROS_INFO("Init time set to %f", timeInit.toSec());
25 
26  if (rn + 1 == MY_ID)
27  {
28  robots_.push_back(new SelfRobot(nh_, initialRobotPose, pf, this, rn));
29  }
30  else
31  {
32  robots_.push_back(
33  new TeammateRobot(nh_, initialRobotPose, pf, this, rn));
34  }
35  }
36  }
37 }
38 
39 RobotFactory::~RobotFactory()
40 {
41  // clean up - delete all variables in heap
42  for (std::vector<Robot*>::iterator it = robots_.begin(); it != robots_.end();
43  ++it)
44  delete *it;
45 
46  robots_.empty();
47 
48  // shutdown function will call SIGINT on this node
49  nh_.shutdown();
50 }

52 void RobotFactory::initializeFixedLandmarks()
53 {
54  std::string filename;
55  using namespace pfuclt_aux;
56 
57  // get the filename from parameter server
58  if (!readParam<std::string>(nh_, "/LANDMARKS_CONFIG", filename))
59  return;
60 
61  // parse the file and copy to vector of Landmarks
62  landmarks = getLandmarks(filename.c_str());
63  ROS_ERROR_COND(landmarks.empty(), "Couldn't open file \"%s\"",
64  filename.c_str());
65 
66  // iterate over the vector and print information
67  for (std::vector<Landmark>::iterator it = landmarks.begin();
68  it != landmarks.end(); ++it)
69  {
70  ROS_INFO("A fixed landmark with ID %d at position {x=%.2f, y=%.2f} \twas "
71  "created",
72  it->serial, it->x, it->y);
73  }
74 }

76 bool RobotFactory::areAllRobotsActive()
77 {
78  for (std::vector<Robot*>::iterator it = robots_.begin(); it != robots_.end();
79  ++it)
80  {
81  if (false == (*it)->hasStarted())
82  return false;
83  }
84  return true;
85 }

87 void Robot::startNow()
88 {
89  timeStarted_ = ros::Time::now();
90  started_ = true;
91  ROS_INFO("OMNI%d has started %.2fs after the initial time", robotNumber_ + 1,
92  ROS_TDIFF(timeStarted_));
93 }
94 
95 void Robot::odometryCallback(const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr& odometry)
96 {
97  if (!started_)
98  startNow();
99 
100  uint seq = odometry->header.seq;
101  prevTime_ = curTime_;
102  curTime_ = odometry->header.stamp;
103 
104  ROS_DEBUG("OMNI%d odometry at time %d", robotNumber_ + 1,
105  odometry->header.stamp.sec);
106 
107  // Below is an example how to extract the odometry from the message and use it
108  // to propagate the robot state by simply concatenating successive odometry
109  // readings-
110  double odomVector[3] = { odometry->pose.pose.position.x,
111  odometry->pose.pose.position.y,
112  tf::getYaw(odometry->pose.pose.orientation) };
113 
114  Eigen::Isometry2d odom;
115  odom = Eigen::Rotation2Dd(odomVector[2]).toRotationMatrix();
116  odom.translation() = Eigen::Vector2d(odomVector[0], odomVector[1]);
117 
118  if (seq == 0)
119  curPose_ = initPose_;
120  else
121  {
122  prevPose_ = curPose_;
123  curPose_ = prevPose_ * odom;
124  }
125 
126  stateBuffer.pose = curPose_;
127  stateBuffer.odometry = odom;
128 
129  /*
130  Eigen::Vector2d t;
131  t = curPose_.translation();
132  Eigen::Matrix<double, 2, 2> r = curPose_.linear();
133  double angle = acos(r(0, 0));
134  */
135 
136  pf_.predict(robotNumber_, odom);
137 }
138 
139 void Robot::targetCallback(const read_omni_dataset::BallData::ConstPtr& target)
140 {
141  if(!started_)
142  startNow();
143 
144  ROS_DEBUG("OMNI%d ball data at time %d", robotNumber_ + 1,
145  target->header.stamp.sec);
146 
147  if (target->found)
148  {
153 
154  Eigen::Vector2d tempBallObsVec = Eigen::Vector2d(target->x, target->y);
155 
156  double d = tempBallObsVec.norm(), phi = atan2(target->y, target->x);
157 
158  double covDD =
159  (double)(1 / target->mismatchFactor) * (K3 * d + K4 * (d * d));
160  double covPhiPhi = K5 * (1 / (d + 1));
161 
162  double covXX =
163  pow(cos(phi), 2) * covDD +
164  pow(sin(phi), 2) * (pow(d, 2) * covPhiPhi + covDD * covPhiPhi);
165  double covYY =
166  pow(sin(phi), 2) * covDD +
167  pow(cos(phi), 2) * (pow(d, 2) * covPhiPhi + covDD * covPhiPhi);
168  // ROS_INFO("Ball found in the image, refer to the method to see how
169  // covariances are calculated");
170  }
171  else
172  {
173  ROS_DEBUG("OMNI%d didn't find the ball at time %d", robotNumber_ + 1,
174  target->header.stamp.sec);
175  }
176 }

178 SelfRobot::SelfRobot(ros::NodeHandle& nh, Eigen::Isometry2d initPose,
179  ParticleFilter& ptcls, RobotFactory* caller,
180  uint robotNumber)
181  : Robot(nh, caller, initPose, ptcls, robotNumber)
182 {
183  // Prepare particle message
184  msg_particles.particles.resize(N_PARTICLES);
185  for (uint part = 0; part < N_PARTICLES; ++part)
186  {
187  msg_particles.particles[part].particle.resize(ptcls.size());
188  }
189 
190  std::string robotNamespace("/omni" +
191  boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(robotNumber + 1));
192 
193  // Subscribe to topics
194  sOdom_ = nh.subscribe<nav_msgs::Odometry>(
195  robotNamespace + "/odometry", 10,
196  boost::bind(&SelfRobot::odometryCallback, this, _1));
197 
198  sBall_ = nh.subscribe<read_omni_dataset::BallData>(
199  robotNamespace + "/orangeball3Dposition", 10,
200  boost::bind(&Robot::targetCallback, this, _1));
201 
202  sLandmark_ = nh.subscribe<read_omni_dataset::LRMLandmarksData>(
203  robotNamespace + "/landmarkspositions", 10,
204  boost::bind(&SelfRobot::landmarkDataCallback, this, _1));
205 
206  // The Graph Generator ans solver should also subscribe to the GT data and
207  // publish it... This is important for time synchronization
208  GT_sub_ = nh.subscribe<read_omni_dataset::LRMGTData>(
209  "gtData_4robotExp", 10,
210  boost::bind(&SelfRobot::gtDataCallback, this, _1));
211  // GT_sub_ = nh->subscribe("gtData_4robotExp", 1000, gtDataCallback);
212 
213  // Advertise some topics; don't change the names, preferably remap in a
214  // launch file
215  State_publisher =
216  nh.advertise<read_omni_dataset::RobotState>("/pfuclt_omni_poses", 1000);
217 
218  targetStatePublisher = nh.advertise<read_omni_dataset::BallData>(
219  "/pfuclt_orangeBallState", 1000);
220 
221  virtualGTPublisher = nh.advertise<read_omni_dataset::LRMGTData>(
222  "/gtData_synced_pfuclt_estimate", 1000);
223 
224  particlePublisher =
225  nh.advertise<pfuclt_omni_dataset::particles>("/pfuclt_particles", 10);
226 
227  ROS_INFO("Created main robot OMNI%d", robotNumber + 1);
228 }

234 void SelfRobot::PFresample()
235 {
236  ROS_DEBUG("Resampling");
237 
238  double stdX, stdY, stdTheta;
239 
240  for (int robNo = 0; robNo < 6;
241  robNo++) // for 4 robots : OMNI4, OMNI3, OMNI1 and OMNI5 in a row
242  {
243 
244  stdX = pfuclt_aux::calc_stdDev<float>(&particleSet_[0 + robNo * 3]);
245  stdY = pfuclt_aux::calc_stdDev<float>(&particleSet_[1 + robNo * 3]);
246  stdTheta = pfuclt_aux::calc_stdDev<float>(&particleSet_[2 + robNo * 3]);
247 
248  //?????????????????????????????? what next?
249  //????????????????????????????????????????????????????
250  }
251 
252  // Duplicate all particles
253  std::vector<float> particlesDuplicate[19];
254  for (int i = 0; i < 19; i++)
255  {
256  particlesDuplicate[i] = particleSet_[i];
257  }
258 
259  // Duplicate particle weights and get sorted indices
260  std::vector<unsigned int> sortedIndex =
261  pfuclt_aux::order_index<float>(particleSet_[18]);
262 
263  // Re-arrange particles according to particle weight sorted indices
264  for (int i = 0; i < N_PARTICLES; i++) // for each particle
265  {
266  size_t index = sortedIndex[i]; // get its new index
267 
268  for (int j = 0; j < 19;
269  j++) // and use the duplicated partiles to sort the set
270  particleSet_[j][i] = particlesDuplicate[j][index];
271 
272  // ROS_DEBUG("Particle at X = %f, Y = %f, Theta = %f has Weight = %f",
273  // particleSet_[])
274  }
275 
276  // Normalize the weights using the sum of all weights
277  float weightSum =
278  std::accumulate(particleSet_[18].begin(), particleSet_[18].end(), 0);
279 
280  // Put into message
281  msg_particles.weightSum = (uint16_t)weightSum;
282 
283  if (weightSum == 0.0)
284  ROS_WARN("WeightSum of Particles = %f\n", weightSum);
285  else
286  {
287  ROS_DEBUG("WeightSum of Particles = %f\n", weightSum);
288  }
289 
290  normalizedWeights = particleSet_[18];
291  std::transform(normalizedWeights.begin(), normalizedWeights.end(),
292  normalizedWeights.begin(),
293  std::bind1st(std::divides<float>(), weightSum));
294 
295  // Duplicate particles for resampling
296  for (int i = 0; i < 19; i++)
297  {
298  particlesDuplicate[i] = particleSet_[i];
299  }
300 
301  // Implementing a very basic resampler... a particle gets selected
302  // proportional to its weight and 50% of the top particles are kept
303  float cumulativeWeights[N_PARTICLES];
304  cumulativeWeights[0] = normalizedWeights[0];
305  for (int par = 1; par < N_PARTICLES; par++)
306  {
307  cumulativeWeights[par] =
308  cumulativeWeights[par - 1] + normalizedWeights[par];
309  }
310 
311  for (int par = 0; par < 100; par++)
312  {
313  for (int k = 0; k < 19; k++)
314  {
315  particleSet_[k][par] = particlesDuplicate[k][par];
316  pf_[k][par] = particleSet_[k][par];
317  msg_particles.particles[par].particle[k] = particleSet_[k][par];
318  }
319  }
320 
321  for (size_t r = 9; r < 12; r++)
322  {
323  // TODO put this back, in a method of the particle filter class
324  /*
325  boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> dist(particleSet_[r][0] - 1.5,
326  particleSet_[r][0] + 1.5);
327  BOOST_FOREACH (float& f, particleSet_[r])
328  {
329  f = dist(seed_);
330  }
331  */
332  }
333 
334  for (int par = 100; par < N_PARTICLES; par++)
335  {
336 
337  // float randNo;
338  // ippsRandUniform_Direct_32f (&randNo, 1, 0, 1, &seed_);
339  //
340  // int m=100;
341  // while(randNo>cumulativeWeights[m])
342  // {
343  // m++;
344  // }
345 
346  // printf("sampled particle = %d, with randNo = %f and cumulativeWeights[%d]
347  // = %f\n",m,randNo,m,cumulativeWeights[m]);
348  for (int k = 0; k < 19; k++)
349  {
350  // particleSet_[k][par] = particlesDuplicate[k][m];
351  pf_[k][par] = particleSet_[k][par];
352  msg_particles.particles[par].particle[k] = particleSet_[k][par];
353  }
354  }
355 
356  // Low variance resampling exactly as implemented in the book Probabilistic
357  // robotics by thrun and burgard
358  // duplicate the particles to add only the selected ones to the new state
359  // float c, u;
360  // Ipp32f r;
361  // c = normalizedWeights[0];
362  // ippsRandUniform_Direct_32f (&r, 1, 0, 1.0 / nParticles_, &seed_);
363  // // cout << "The random number r for LVSampler is = " << r << endl <<
364  // endl;
365  // int m, i = 1;
366  // for (m = 0; m < nParticles_; m++)
367  // {
368  //
369  // //printf("Particle weight at %d = %f\n",m,normalizedWeights[m]);
370  // u = r + (m) * (1.0 / nParticles_);
371  // while (u > c)
372  // {
373  // i = i + 1;
374  // c = c + normalizedWeights[i];
375  // }
376  // if (i < nParticles_)
377  // {
378  // cout << "The sampled Particle is = " << i <<endl;
379  // for(int k=0; k<19;k++)
380  // {
381  // particleSet_[k][m] = particlesDuplicate[k][i];
382  // }
383  // }
384  // }
385  // // //cout<<"Max i is "<<i<<endl;
386 
390  // for(int robNo = 0; robNo<5; robNo++) // for 4 robots : OMNI4, OMNI3,
391  // OMNI1 and OMNI5 in a row
392  // {
393  // //Find the Weighted mean of the particles
394  //
395  // Ipp32f weightedMeanXYZ[3];
396  // weightedMeanXYZ[0] = 0.0;

442 void SelfRobot::tryInitializeParticles()
443 {

445  {

447  pf_.init(CUSTOM_PARTICLE_INIT);
448  else
449  pf_.init();

454  {
455  for (int j = 0; j < 19; j++)
456  {

461  }
462 }

464 void SelfRobot::odometryCallback(const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr& odometry)
465 {
466  // Self robot initializes the particles
467  if (!pf_.isInitialized())
468  tryInitializeParticles();
469 
470  // Call base class' method
471  Robot::odometryCallback(odometry);
472 }

474 void SelfRobot::landmarkDataCallback(
475  const read_omni_dataset::LRMLandmarksData::ConstPtr& landmarkData)
476 {
477  ROS_DEBUG("OMNI%d landmark data at time %d", robotNumber_ + 1,
478  landmarkData->header.stamp.sec);
479 
480  // TODO figure out a way
481  return;
482 
483  bool landmarkfound[10];
484  float d_0 =
485  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[0], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[0], 2)), 0.5);
486  float d_1 =
487  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[1], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[1], 2)), 0.5);
488  float d_2 =
489  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[2], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[2], 2)), 0.5);
490  float d_3 =
491  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[3], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[3], 2)), 0.5);
492  float d_4 =
493  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[4], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[4], 2)), 0.5);
494  float d_5 =
495  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[5], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[5], 2)), 0.5);
496  float d_6 =
497  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[6], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[6], 2)), 0.5);
498  float d_7 =
499  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[7], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[7], 2)), 0.5);
500  float d_8 =
501  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[8], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[8], 2)), 0.5);
502  float d_9 =
503  pow((pow(landmarkData->x[9], 2) + pow(landmarkData->y[9], 2)), 0.5);
504 
505  for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
506  {
507  landmarkfound[i] = landmarkData->found[i];
508  }
509 
510  // Huristic 1. If I see only 8 and not 9.... then I cannot see 7
511  if (landmarkData->found[8] && !landmarkData->found[9])
512  {
513  landmarkfound[7] = false;
514  }
515 
516  // Huristic 2. If I see only 9 and not 8.... then I cannot see 6
517  if (!landmarkData->found[8] && landmarkData->found[9])
518  {
519  landmarkfound[6] = false;
520  }
521 
522  // Huristic 3. If I see both 8 and 9.... then there are 2 subcases
523  if (landmarkData->found[8] && landmarkData->found[9])
524  {
525  // Huristic 3.1. If I am closer to 9.... then I cannot see 6
526  if (d_9 < d_8)
527  {
528  landmarkfound[6] = false;
529  }
530  // Huristic 3.2 If I am closer to 8.... then I cannot see 7
531  if (d_8 < d_9)
532  {
533  landmarkfound[7] = false;
534  }
535  }
536 
537  float lm_4_thresh, lm_5_thresh, lm_8_thresh, lm_9_thresh;
538 
539  if (robotNumber_ == 4)
540  {
541  lm_4_thresh = 3.0;
542  lm_5_thresh = 3.0;
543  lm_8_thresh = 3.0;
544  lm_9_thresh = 3.0;
545  }
546 
547  if (robotNumber_ == 3)
548  {
549  lm_4_thresh = 6.5;
550  lm_5_thresh = 6.5;
551  lm_8_thresh = 6.5;
552  lm_9_thresh = 6.5;
553  }
554 
555  if (robotNumber_ == 1)
556  {
557  lm_4_thresh = 6.5;
558  lm_5_thresh = 6.5;
559  lm_8_thresh = 6.5;
560  lm_9_thresh = 6.5;
561  }
562 
563  if (robotNumber_ == 5)
564  {
565  lm_4_thresh = 3.5;
566  lm_5_thresh = 3.5;
567  lm_8_thresh = 3.5;
568  lm_9_thresh = 3.5;
569  }
570 
571  // Huristic 4. Additional huristic for landmark index 6.... if I observe it
572  // further than 4m then nullify it
573  if (d_6 > 3.5)
574  {
575  landmarkfound[6] = false;
576  }
577 
578  // Huristic 5. Additional huristic for landmark index 7.... if I observe it
579  // further than 4m then nullify it
580  if (d_7 > 3.5)
581  {
582  landmarkfound[7] = false;
583  }
584 
585  // Huristic 6. Additional huristic for landmark index 8.... if I observe it
586  // further than 4m then nullify it
587  if (d_8 > lm_8_thresh)
588  {
589  landmarkfound[8] = false;
590  }
591 
592  // Huristic 7. Additional huristic for landmark index 9.... if I observe it
593  // further than 4m then nullify it
594  if (d_9 > lm_9_thresh)
595  {
596  landmarkfound[9] = false;
597  }
598 
599  // Huristic 8. Additional huristic for landmark index 4.... if I observe it
600  // further than 4m then nullify it
601  if (d_4 > lm_4_thresh)
602  {
603  landmarkfound[4] = false;
604  }
605 
606  // Huristic 9. Additional huristic for landmark index 5.... if I observe it
607  // further than 4m then nullify it
608  if (d_5 > lm_5_thresh)
609  {
610  landmarkfound[5] = false;
611  }
612 
613  // Huristic 10. Additional huristic for landmark index 0.... if I observe it
614  // further than 4m then nullify it
615  if (d_0 > 2.5)
616  {
617  landmarkfound[0] = false;
618  }
619 
620  // Huristic 11. Additional huristic for landmark index 1.... if I observe it
621  // further than 4m then nullify it
622  if (d_1 > 2.5)
623  {
624  landmarkfound[1] = false;
625  }
626 
627  // Huristic 12. Additional huristic for landmark index 2.... if I observe it
628  // further than 4m then nullify it
629  if (d_2 > 2.5)
630  {
631  landmarkfound[2] = false;
632  }
633 
634  // Huristic 13. Additional huristic for landmark index 3.... if I observe it
635  // further than 4m then nullify it
636  if (d_3 > 2.5)
637  {
638  landmarkfound[3] = false;
639  }
640 
641  uint seq = landmarkData->header.seq;
642 
643  // There are a total of 10 distinct, known and static landmarks in this
644  // dataset.
645 
646  for (int p = 0; p < N_PARTICLES; p++)
647  {
648  pf_.resetWeights();
649  particleSet_[(MAX_ROBOTS + 1) * STATES_PER_ROBOT][p] = 1.0;
650  }
651 
652  for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
653  {
654  if (landmarkfound[i])
655  {
656 
661 
662  Eigen::Vector2d tempLandmarkObsVec =
663  Eigen::Vector2d(landmarkData->x[i], landmarkData->y[i]);
664 
665  double d = tempLandmarkObsVec.norm(),
666  phi = atan2(landmarkData->y[i], landmarkData->x[i]);
667 
668  double covDD =
669  (K1 * fabs(1.0 - (landmarkData->AreaLandMarkActualinPixels[i] /
670  landmarkData->AreaLandMarkExpectedinPixels[i]))) *
671  (d * d);
672  double covPhiPhi = 10 * K2 * (1 / (d + 1));
673 
674  double covXX =
675  pow(cos(phi), 2) * covDD +
676  pow(sin(phi), 2) * (pow(d, 2) * covPhiPhi + covDD * covPhiPhi);
677  double covYY =
678  pow(sin(phi), 2) * covDD +
679  pow(cos(phi), 2) * (pow(d, 2) * covPhiPhi + covDD * covPhiPhi);
680 
681  for (int p = 0; p < N_PARTICLES; p++)
682  {
683 
684  // float ObsWorldLM_X = particleSet_[0+(robotNumber_-1)*3][p] +
685  // landmarkData->x[i]* cos(particleSet_[2+(robotNumber_-1)*3][p]) -
686  // landmarkData->y[i]*sin(particleSet_[2+(robotNumber_-1)*3][p]);
687  // float ObsWorldLM_Y = particleSet_[1+(robotNumber_-1)*3][p] +
688  // landmarkData->x[i]* sin(particleSet_[2+(robotNumber_-1)*3][p]) +
689  // landmarkData->y[i]*cos(particleSet_[2+(robotNumber_-1)*3][p]);
690  //
691  //
692  // float error = powf( (powf((landmarks[i][0] - ObsWorldLM_X),2)
693  // +
694  // powf((landmarks[i][1] - ObsWorldLM_Y),2)) , 0.5 );
695  //
696  // if(error>1.0)
697  // {
698  // cout<<"Landmark "<<i+1<<" observation at timestep
699  // "<<landmarkData->header.stamp <<" is at X = "<<landmarkData->x[i]<<"
700  // at Y = "<<landmarkData->y[i]<<" covXX = "<<covXX<<" covYY =
701  // "<<covYY<<endl;
702  //
703  // cout<<"Landmark "<<i+1<<" actuall is at X =
704  // "<<landmarks[i][0]<<" at Y = "<<landmarks[i][1]<<endl<<endl;
705  // }
706 
707  // More formal method is this
708  float Z[2], Zcap[2], Q[2][2], Q_inv[2][2], Z_Zcap[2];
709 
710  Z[0] = landmarkData->x[i];
711  Z[1] = landmarkData->y[i];
712 
713  Zcap[0] =
714  (landmarks[i].x - particleSet_[0 + (robotNumber_ - 1) * 3][p]) *
715  (cos(particleSet_[2 + (robotNumber_ - 1) * 3][p])) +
716  (landmarks[i].y - particleSet_[1 + (robotNumber_ - 1) * 3][p]) *
717  (sin(particleSet_[2 + (robotNumber_ - 1) * 3][p]));
718 
719  Zcap[1] =
720  -(landmarks[i].x - particleSet_[0 + (robotNumber_ - 1) * 3][p]) *
721  (sin(particleSet_[2 + (robotNumber_ - 1) * 3][p])) +
722  (landmarks[i].y - particleSet_[1 + (robotNumber_ - 1) * 3][p]) *
723  (cos(particleSet_[2 + (robotNumber_ - 1) * 3][p]));
724 
725  Z_Zcap[0] = Z[0] - Zcap[0];
726  Z_Zcap[1] = Z[1] - Zcap[1];
727 
728  Q[0][0] = covXX;
729  Q[0][1] = 0.0;
730  Q[1][0] = 0.0;
731  Q[1][1] = covYY;
732 
733  Q_inv[0][0] = 1 / covXX;
734  Q_inv[0][1] = 0.0;
735  Q_inv[1][0] = 0.0;
736  Q_inv[1][1] = 1 / covYY;
737  float ExpArg = -0.5 * (Z_Zcap[0] * Z_Zcap[0] * Q_inv[0][0] +
738  Z_Zcap[1] * Z_Zcap[1] * Q_inv[1][1]);
739  float detValue = powf((2 * PI * Q[0][0] * Q[1][1]), -0.5);
740 
741  // cout<<"weight of particle at x =
742  // "<<particleSet_[0+(robotNumber_-1)*3][p]<<" , Y =
743  // "<<particleSet_[1+(robotNumber_-1)*3][p]<<" and orientation =
744  // "<<particleSet_[2+(robotNumber_-1)*3][p] <<" has ExpArg = "
745  // <<ExpArg<<endl;
746 
747  particleSet_[(MAX_ROBOTS + 1) * 3][p] =
748  particleSet_[(MAX_ROBOTS + 1) * 3][p] + 1 * exp(ExpArg);
749  // particleSet_[(MAX_ROBOTS+1)*3][p] =
750  // pfParticlesSelf[p][(MAX_ROBOTS+1)*3];
751  }
752  // ROS_INFO("Landmark %d found in the image, refer to the method to see
753  // how covariances are calculated",i);
754  }
755  }
756 
757  // if(seq%30==0)
758  PFresample();
759  //
760  // for(int i=0; i<nParticles_; i++)
761  // {
762  // cout<<"weight of particle at x =
763  // "<<particleSet_[0+(robotNumber_-1)*3][i]<<" , Y =
764  // "<<particleSet_[1+(robotNumber_-1)*3][i]<<" and orientation =
765  // "<<particleSet_[2+(robotNumber_-1)*3][i] <<" has weight = "
766  // <<particleSet_[(MAX_ROBOTS+1)*3][i]<<endl;
767  // }
768  // cout<<"just before publishing state"<<endl;
769  publishState(0, 0, 0);
770 }
771 
772 void SelfRobot::gtDataCallback(
773  const read_omni_dataset::LRMGTData::ConstPtr& gtMsgReceived)
774 {
775  receivedGTdata = *gtMsgReceived;
776 }
777 
778 void SelfRobot::publishState(float x, float y, float theta)
779 {
780  // using the first robot for the globaltime stamp of this message
781  // printf("we are here \n\n\n");
782 
783  // first publish the particles!!!!
784  particlePublisher.publish(msg_particles);
785 
786  msg_state.header.stamp =
787  curTime_; // time of the self-robot must be in the full state
788  receivedGTdata.header.stamp = curTime_;
789 
790  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.position.x = x;
791  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.position.y = y;
792  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.position.z =
793  ROB_HT; // fixed height aboveground
794 
795  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.orientation.x = 0;
796  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.orientation.y = 0;
797  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.orientation.z = sin(theta / 2);
798  msg_state.robotPose[MY_ID - 1].pose.pose.orientation.w = cos(theta / 2);
799 
800  State_publisher.publish(msg_state);
801  virtualGTPublisher.publish(receivedGTdata);
802 }
803 
804 TeammateRobot::TeammateRobot(ros::NodeHandle& nh, Eigen::Isometry2d initPose,
805  ParticleFilter& ptcls, RobotFactory* caller,
806  uint robotNumber)
807  : Robot(nh, caller, initPose, ptcls, robotNumber)
808 {
809  std::string robotNamespace("/omni" +
810  boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(robotNumber + 1));
811 
812  sOdom_ = nh.subscribe<nav_msgs::Odometry>(
813  robotNamespace + "/odometry", 10,
814  boost::bind(&Robot::odometryCallback, this, _1));
815 
816  sBall_ = nh.subscribe<read_omni_dataset::BallData>(
817  robotNamespace + "/orangeball3Dposition", 10,
818  boost::bind(&Robot::targetCallback, this, _1));
819 
820  sLandmark_ = nh.subscribe<read_omni_dataset::LRMLandmarksData>(
821  robotNamespace + "/landmarkspositions", 10,
822  boost::bind(&TeammateRobot::LandmarkDataCallback, this, _1));
823 
824  ROS_INFO("Created teammate OMNI%d", robotNumber + 1);
825 }
826 
827 void TeammateRobot::LandmarkDataCallback(
828  const read_omni_dataset::LRMLandmarksData::ConstPtr& landmarkData)
829 {
830  // ROS_INFO(" got landmark data from teammate robot (ID=%d)",RobotNumber);
831 
832  uint seq = landmarkData->header.seq;
833 
834  // There are a total of 10 distinct, known and static landmarks in this
835  // dataset.
836  for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
837  {
838  if (landmarkData->found[i])
839  {
840 
845 
846  Eigen::Vector2d tempLandmarkObsVec =
847  Eigen::Vector2d(landmarkData->x[i], landmarkData->y[i]);
848 
849  double d = tempLandmarkObsVec.norm(),
850  phi = atan2(landmarkData->y[i], landmarkData->x[i]);
851 
852  double covDD =
853  (K1 * fabs(1.0 - (landmarkData->AreaLandMarkActualinPixels[i] /
854  landmarkData->AreaLandMarkExpectedinPixels[i]))) *
855  (d * d);
856  double covPhiPhi = K2 * (1 / (d + 1));
857 
858  double covXX =
859  pow(cos(phi), 2) * covDD +
860  pow(sin(phi), 2) * (pow(d, 2) * covPhiPhi + covDD * covPhiPhi);
861  double covYY =
862  pow(sin(phi), 2) * covDD +
863  pow(cos(phi), 2) * (pow(d, 2) * covPhiPhi + covDD * covPhiPhi);
864 
865  // ROS_INFO("Landmark %d found in the image, refer to the method to see
866  // how covariances are calculated",i);
867  }
868  }
869 }
870 
871 // end of namespace
872 }
873 
874 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
875 {
876 
877  ros::init(argc, argv, "pfuclt_omni_dataset");
878  ros::NodeHandle nh;
879 
880  // Set debug if asked
881  if (argc > 2)
882  {
883  if (!strcmp(argv[2], "true"))
884  {
885  if (ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_DEFAULT_NAME,
886  ros::console::levels::Debug))
887  {
888  ros::console::notifyLoggerLevelsChanged();
889  }
890  }
891 
892  ROS_DEBUG("DEBUG mode set");
893  }
894 
895  // read parameters from param server
896  using pfuclt_aux::readParam;
897  using namespace pfuclt;
898 
899  readParam<int>(nh, "/MAX_ROBOTS", MAX_ROBOTS);
900  readParam<float>(nh, "/ROB_HT", ROB_HT);
901  readParam<int>(nh, "/MY_ID", MY_ID);
902  readParam<int>(nh, "/N_PARTICLES", N_PARTICLES);
903  readParam<int>(nh, "/NUM_SENSORS_PER_ROBOT", NUM_SENSORS_PER_ROBOT);
904  readParam<int>(nh, "/NUM_TARGETS", NUM_TARGETS);
905  readParam<float>(nh, "/LANDMARK_COV/K1", K1);
906  readParam<float>(nh, "/LANDMARK_COV/K2", K2);
907  readParam<float>(nh, "/LANDMARK_COV/K3", K3);
908  readParam<float>(nh, "/LANDMARK_COV/K4", K4);
909  readParam<float>(nh, "/LANDMARK_COV/K5", K5);
910  readParam<bool>(nh, "/PLAYING_ROBOTS", PLAYING_ROBOTS);
911  readParam<double>(nh, "/POS_INIT", POS_INIT);
912  readParam<bool>(nh, "/USE_CUSTOM_VALUES", USE_CUSTOM_VALUES);
913 
914  uint total_size = (MAX_ROBOTS + NUM_TARGETS) * STATES_PER_ROBOT;
915 
916  if (USE_CUSTOM_VALUES)
917  {
918  readParam<double>(nh, "/CUSTOM_PARTICLE_INIT", CUSTOM_PARTICLE_INIT);
919  if (CUSTOM_PARTICLE_INIT.size() != (total_size * 2))
920  {
921  ROS_ERROR("/CUSTOM_PARTICLE_INIT given but not of correct size - should "
922  "have %d numbers and has %d",
923  total_size * 2, (int)CUSTOM_PARTICLE_INIT.size());
924  }
925  }
926 
927  if (N_PARTICLES < 0 || total_size < 0)
928  {
929  ROS_ERROR("Unacceptable configuration for particles class");
930  nh.shutdown();
931  return 0;
932  }
933 
934  pfuclt::RobotFactory Factory(nh);
935 
936  if (pfuclt::MY_ID == 2)
937  {
938  // ROS_WARN("OMNI2 not present in dataset. Please try with another Robot ID
939  // for self robot");
940  return 0;
941  }
942 
943  Factory.initializeFixedLandmarks();
944 
945  ros::spin();
946  return 0;
947 }
